comment:
Prof. Wetherhead is an industry professional and she expects a lot out of you. She is very accessible and understanding of what life can throw at you, as long as you are up front.

Proofreading is your friend in this class and so is paying attention to dates. Do not wait until the last minute to download class materials.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Gives good feedback

comment: Professor Wetherhead is a caring professor and wants all of her students to succeed. I would advise taking her classes in person as her assignments are better understood that way. The class isn't hard, but it does require a lot of work. 2 major papers, one is a group paper and an individual paper. 5 exams based on cases, and some small assignments.

This has been one of the hardest classes I have taken this semester, but so worth it. My writing has become so much better and she is the sweetest professor ever. In her own words, she will be the hardest grader that you will ever have but your writing will improve. I feel ready to begin my professional career after taking this class.

She is a really hard grader. I took a different class of hers before and it was fine but this one was awful. She always took off on how she would rephrase what I said and not what she was suppose to grade on. I sent my hw to her ahead of time to improve but would still get C's. She gave everyone bad grades. She was willing to help but it didnt help
Pay attention to and study her lecture powerpoints and you will pass. if you don't understand something, email her. she's good with communicating.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria--Lecture heavy

comment: While the assignments really took a lot of effort to check over yourself to make sure the usage of AP writing was done correctly.. She provided excellent feedback and even took an hour out of her Saturday to help me correct an assignment. I will take the skills she taught me in this class to my professional life.
She is so sweet and very knowledgeable and experienced in the field. Her online lectures are full of information which is all you need for the exams- no textbooks!

Professor Wetherhead is extremely passionate about what she does and it is obvious through how enthusiastic she is in her lectures, even in an online setting. tests are tricky, but her reviews provide LITERALLY everything you need to know.

I've taken all of her classes that I possibly could. Her tests are tricky, but if you pay attention and study the review guide, there's no reason why you shouldn't do well. ALSO, attendance is mandatory but she allows multiple absences. 11/10 would recommend.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: I took her for every class I could, and I would follow her everywhere! She's THE BEST professor, and the knowledge she brings into her classes is insane! She's so, so passionate about PR, and she wants you to succeed and learn. There are not enough characters here to describe just how WONDERFUL she is! Seriously, though, TAKE HER!!! I stan <3

Professor Wetherhead was a great professor!! She cares for students and WANTS them to succeed! Only graded on 5 tests which are moderately difficult, but she gives a review day before each test. Attendance is mandatory. The book is not required, but would probably help on the tests?
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: I've had professor Wetherhead now for 3 classes and I love her so much. She will teach you SO much. She is a tough grader, but fair and does everything for your own benefit.

Professor Wetherhead is awesome. She's definitely a tough grader and you really have to work hard in her class or you won't pass. If you do everything you're supposed to, you'll come out of this class a better writer for sure. Don't bother buying the textbook!! I didn't open it a single time. Her tests are STRAIGHT from the review powerpoints.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Gives good feedback--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: Wetherhead is a super kind and knowledgeable woman. She really cares about the well being of her students. She explains concepts in engaging ways. I hope to take more of her classes. You don't have to buy a textbook, because she tells you everything you need to know from it. She also adds in real life application from her acclaimed previous jobs.

Wetherhead really knows what she's talking about. Her whole heart is in PR & she wants you to love it just as much. You have a lot of assignments to help build your portfolio & gives you feedback to improve your work. She's not an easy A, but you'll leave the class with better writing skills. Wonderful professor!
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Gives good feedback--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: Wetherhead is the best professor! She makes class enjoyable and even though she is an extremely easy professor you learn a lot from her. I have taken other classes with her and did not need the book, but since this is cases you use the book every week. 4 free absences and gives a study guide for every test that is exactly what is on the test.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Okay, she's hard but worth it. I can honestly say I learned something in this class which is rare. Do the assignments, there will be one every week, they take about an hour. She gives great feedback and will absolutely sit down with you if you need help. Lectures aren't boring and overall she's a great professor for this class.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Amazing lectures

comment: She's a wonderful lady who keeps things interesting when they get boring. Her assignments are straight to the point but her test can be difficult. Make sure you really understand the information and not just memorize words. Textbook was rarely used since she gives you the information on powerpoint and gives you a study guide as well.

i have taken this class twice now and i absolutely love ms wetherhead. she has so much real world experience and applies it to her teachings in a way that you understand if youre new to the PR world. her tests are pretty striaght up and if you look over and study the powerpoints you will be just fine. she is also really helpful with feedback
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Would take again

comment: Wetherhead is GREAT. Her class is all a lecture on power points, but she creates an exam study guide for each test which is the EXACT test and has a review day. Can only miss 3 classes but she wants you to succeed and will help you along the way. Would totally take her again. Study for the tests and you will easily make an A

Wetherhead is a good professor. She cares about her students and wants them to do well. The class is lecture based and tests come from the exam study guide. Her tests are difficult but I would take her again. Attendance is mandatory and don't be late.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Professor Wetherhead is AWESOME. In her classes you will have four tests, a few homework assignments and a group project. She is a very fair grader and gives you amazing powerpoint notes and exam reviews. If you study her exam review you will do well on the tests. Overall, cares a lot for her students and wants everyone to succeed! Highly reccomend

She is the BEST. I have had her for multiple classes and have loved every class. Her test are tough but go to class and study her reviews and you will be good. She works so hard to make sure her students are truly learning. I can't talk highly enough! She will teach you about the PR world and not just the usual book stuff.

She's an awesome teacher who really cares about her students. My BEST advice is to literally memorize her exam reviews word for word and you'll do great on her tests-these are the only grades you get, no homework. She is very strict on attendance so just show up. Highly recommend.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY--Caring

comment: Professor Wetherhead is an excellent instructor. She really cares about her students and wants everyone to pass. She is very clear on what she expects from each student and she is a great communicator. What to expect: because she is a new instructor, things may change for future students; Two exams, four homework assignments and one group project.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Took PR Strategies with Wetherhead and its been one of my favorite classes in college. Only 2 tests, 4 homeworks, and a big group project at the end of the semester. Homeworks are super easy, but tests are somewhat tricky at times. Lectures are long, but helpful. Very attainable to get an A in this class. Take her, she is great!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: LOVE LOVE LOVE Professor Wetherhead. Very knowledgable on PR writing, she gives you multiple sample outlines to help you write each paper. You do have to write a lot, but she is very helpful and grades fairly. Attendance is mandatory. But she is very sweet and passionate about her classes, definitely take her if you get the chance!
